cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each nginx instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each nginx task.

role.description: Deploy nginx only on nodes with this role.

contentDir.description: Path of directory, relative to sandbox, containing HTML code. Can NOT be combined with configUrl.

contentUrl.description: URL of content that needs to be hosted. Can NOT be combined with configUrl.

configUrl.description: URL to Nginx vhost configurations (e.g., load balancing, reverse proxy, etc). Can NOT be combined with contentUrl or contentDir.

bridge.description: Whether to use BRIDGE networking mode for Docker container. By default, this is true and BRIDGE mode networking is used.

virtual-host.description: The virtual host address to configure for integration with Marathon-lb.

https-redirect.description: Whether Marathon-lb should redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS. This requires 'virtual-host' to be set. By default, this is false.
